sentence: JETBLUE OFFERS TO BUY SPIRIT AIRLINES FOR ABOUT $3.6 BILLION CASH In a Tuesday release, Rep. Eric Swalwell, D-Calif., Sen. Jack Reed, D-R.I., and Rep. Brian Fitzpatrick, R-Penn., said that the Protection from Abusive Passengers Act could stiffen penalties against offenders.
author: Julia Musto
title: Lawmakers introduce no-fly list legislation to protect airline crews from abusive passengers

sentence: On April 6, Sen. Jack Reed (D-R.I.) and Reps. Eric Swalwell (D-Calif.) and Brian Fitzpatrick (R-Pa.) introduced the Protection from Abusive Passengers Act in the Senate.
title: No, there isn’t a federal no-fly list for unruly passengers
